programme.title: Sebbe De Buck vs Kevin Backstrom
programme.desc: Snowboarders Sebbe De Buck and Kevin Backstrom face off in the Swiss Alps. (16 minutes)

programme.title: Spencer O’Brien vs Mary Rand
programme.desc: Snowboarders Spencer O’Brien and Mary Rand go into battle on Mount Kirkup for a spot in Revelstoke, Canada. (16 minutes)

programme.title: Raibu Katayama vs Torgeir Bergrem
programme.desc: Torgeir Bergrem and Raibu Katayama go head-to-head in Myoko, Japan, for a chance to qualify for Revelstoke. (17 minutes)

programme.title: Red Gerard vs Austen Sweetin
programme.desc: The Froth Goblin vs The Golden Boy: Washington’s Austen Sweetin and Colorado’s Red Gerard duel at Scarp Ridge. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Temporal Collection
programme.desc: Timeless surfing in a stunning cinematic portrayal that oscillates between mesmerising and electric. (102 minutes)

programme.title: Shires
programme.desc: Narrated by Rob Warner, Shires is all about UK riding – the riders, landscapes and the ever-changing weather. (51 minutes)

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Kai Lenny's balancing act looks different in 2023, and his home life and performance goals are ready to reset. (17 minutes)

programme.title: Proving ground (part 1)
programme.desc: The Eddie is on and Kai Lenny has plenty to prove on the North Shore of Oahu at both Pipeline and Waimea Bay. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Proving ground (part 2)
programme.desc: Kai Lenny chases a dream win at The Eddie then takes on the World Tour’s best pro surfers at Sunset Beach. (22 minutes)

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: At mid-season, Kai Lenny heads to Alaska for surf and snow heli sessions with snowboarding icon Travis Rice. (24 minutes)

programme.title: Strike
programme.desc: Kai Lenny goes on a 24-hour strike mission to Tahiti and pushes the limits of what’s possible in the ocean. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Rescue
programme.desc: Kai Lenny kicks off the big wave season at Jaws and faces the risks that come with his pursuit of progression. (26 minutes)

programme.title: Layers
programme.desc: Discover and celebrate the unique people, places, personalities and layers behind what we call snowboarding. (88 minutes)

programme.title: Metal on Streif: Dominik Paris in Kitzbühel
programme.desc: Follow top alpine ski racer Dominik Paris during the week of Kitzbühel in the lead up to the Hahnenkamm race. (33 minutes)

programme.title: Arc
programme.desc: Take an inspirational look at the life and surfing of Taylor Knox and other great surfers. (36 minutes)

programme.title: A wild whitewater race
programme.desc: In this wild whitewater race teams create their own man-made vessels and race down a 234m rapids course. (24 minutes)

programme.title: Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.desc: MXGP Champion Jorge Prado takes on a new challenge: racing Supercross in America. (28 minutes)

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Taylor Steele's high action surf movie defines the cutting edge of performance surfing in the mid-90s. (52 minutes)

programme.title: Formula One drivers race as Australian surf lifesavers
programme.desc: Max Verstappen, Sergio Pérez, Daniel Ricciardo and Yuki Tsunoda race Can-Am Commanders in Melbourne. (7 minutes)
